name: Jester Street: Card Counting Trainer
description:
Take control of the Game: Pause, Resume, see all Previous Cards, their Card Count Value, the Running & True Count; all in order to 'keep the count' -providing an advantage to the Player (when to bet BIG!).

The game of Blackjack will consist of (various) amounts of Decks, & knowing the current Running Count will enable you to calculate these best strategic betting points. See Utilities below for more info.

Blackjack, Play;



  • Bet ($5, $10, $25, $50 Chips), Split, Double, Stand, Hit
  • 2No. Static BOT's (Adding difficulty to Player Counting)
  • Visual Arm Betting Animations (Hit, Stand, Split, Double)

Utilities;



  • Complete Card Listing/Viewing [Toggable]
  • Pause (End of hand) Play [Toggable]
  • True Count Chart
  • Touch Screen P.C/Settings
  • Basic Strategy Chart
  • Advanced Play's Chart
  • Hit, Stand or Double Hit Chart
  • Card Count Values [Toggleable]

Deck(s);



  • Choose: 1 to 8 decks. (6 as default -as most Casinos).

Customizable;



  • Table Felt
  • Arm Interactive Colour
  • Light Control

Control



  • Point/Click
  • Keyboard Shortcuts
